summary: Documentary on the making of Kubrick's classic film.

Harris|Alexander Walker|Lee Minoff|Ken Adam|Carol Southern|Nile Southern|James Earl Jones|Bridget Sellers|Peter Murton|Gilbert Taylor|Dee Vaughan|Ray Lovejoy|Joseph McGrath|Pamela Carlton|Anthony Harvey|Shane Rimmer|Roger Caras|John Baxter|Kelvin Pike|Tracy Reed|Sidney Lumet|Bud Rosenthal|Pablo Ferro|Laurie Johnson|Richard Kahn|Sidney Ganis|William Bassett
keywords: making of|nuclear war|interview|behind the scenes|comedy filmmaking
title: Inside: 'Dr. Strangelove or How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb'
